/ CSGAMMAH/S,N,CSCONCD/IMPFID/S,N,ANALYCHN/COSMID/ S,N,INICNT/NOETT/S,N,ISWITCH/ /DBGLVL/ TSTATOLD/// S,N,NOUE//LGSET/LPSET/////////////////NLRIGID/ /LUSETS///RADMOD/ S,N,MPCF1 /NOOSETX /S,N,NGPSP/1 // S,N,MSCHGX/ /S,N,GPSP / /S,N,NNEW / S,N,NNEWS/S,N,NNEWM/S,N,MSCHGY/S,N,ATSPCOLD/RSTRT / RSONLY / SPCGEN /EPPRT /EPZERO /PRGPST / LLSET /XAUTOMST / AUTOSPCR /// /‘ROTORID’/‘ROTRSEID’/ NLHEAT/// TLSETOLD//S,N,LUSETD/ /DELDBFLG///S,N,KDFLTGEN/LOADFACR/ /N3DCONT/S,N,MSGCNT/LSETID/PLSETID/ NLBUCK/IANLCHNG/S,N,NLDIFF/NOULNTH//MARCELM/ IRGYRO/GYROTAN/DBGUNIT//S400S2S /S,N,S2SKPPL / APP ///// S,N,MGE //ALPHA2/S,N,MSCHGX0/ /ECHG/LNSET/LNESET/ USETPRT/USETSEL/USETSTR1/USETSTR2/ USETSTR3/USETSTR4/FOLLOWK0/ LFESET/FKDIAG/PRDSLV/NOPSET/KDIAG/KDIAGS/MDSTAT/ HTSYMFAC/HTPCONVM/HTSYM//ASING/S,N,INITX/ S,N,NRNENC/S,N,OLDM2PP $ CASEXX Subset of CASECC for current STEP case. PPTNL Applied load vectors. YSH Matrix of enforced displacements. ELDATAH T able of combined nonlinear information data. KELMNL Stiffness matrix for nonlinear elements. KPPLXX Stiffness matrix for linear elements (p-set). GMNE Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by ne-set).

2285 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index MPTS Material properties table. DITS Direct input tables. KFEFE Tangential stiffness (fe-set). DLT1COMX Dynamic load table for follower forces. CSTMS Coordinate system transformation matrices. BGPDTS Basic grid point definition table. SILS Scalar index list. USETD Displacement set definition table (p-set). BFEFE Damping matrix or heat capacitance matrix), (fe-set). MFEFE Mass matrix (or radiation matrix for heat transfer), (fe-set). NLFT Nonlinear forcing table. RDEST Radiation element summary table. RECM Radiation exchange coefficient matrix. BPP Damping matrix or heat capacitance matrix (p-set). GPSNTS Grid point shell normal table. DITID Table of ID numbers in DIT . DEQIND Index table to DEQATN for CBUSH1 shock absorber. DEQATN Table of DEQATN for CBUSH1 shock absorber. MPP Mass matrix (p-set). MBSP Updated mass matrix (s-set). MBFEP Updated mass matrix (fe-set by p-set). MMP Mass matrix (m-set by p-set). GMFE Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by fe-set). GMS Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by s-set). MFEFEI Matrix of right pseudo-inverse. RMPTQM Not used GEOM4 Constraints, DOF membership and rigid element connectivity table. KPPT Tangential Stiffness (p-set). YVH Matrix of enforced velocities. YAH Matrix of enforced accelerations. GPTT1 Table of grid point temperatures (for transient analysis only). EPTS Element Property T able. TMLD Table of loads for non-linear transient analysis. ROTORT Table of rotordynamics user input for transient analysis.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2286 Main Index BGFAM Family of gyroscopic matrices (p-set). KCFAM Family of circulation matrices (p-set). ENZGD T able of unbalance terms in rotor dynamics. CONTACT Contact regions specification table ACTNODS T able of all active nodes. ESTLT Combine ESTL and the temperature load related data from ELDATA. N2M Advanced elements in model. KDFEFE Sum of differential stiffness and follower stiffness. RGNL Original RG matrix used for LMT transformation. YM Non-homogeneous MPC coefficients for LMT transformation. KDICT0 Element K-mat dictionary for linear elements. KELEM0 Element K-mat for linear elements. KDICTNL Element K-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. K2PPCAS Direct matrix input for stiffness. KDDICTL Element Kd-mat dictionary for linear elements. KDELML Element Kd-mat for linear elements. KDDICTNL Element Kd-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. KDELMNL Element Kd-mat for non-linear elements. KFDICT Element FF K-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. KFELM Element FF K-mat for non-linear elements. BKDICT Element K-mat dictionary for non-linear contact elements. BKELM Element K-mat for non-linear contact elements. EDT T able used to read RDITER for iterative solver. MDICT0 Element M-mat dictionary for linear elements. MELM0 Element M-mat for linear elements. BDICT0 Element B-mat dictionary for linear elements. BELM0 Element B-mat for linear elements. BDICTNL Element B-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. BELMNL Element B-mat for non-linear elements. M2PPCAS Direct matrix input for mass. B2PPCAS Direct matrix input for damping. EQDYN Dynamics equivalence internal to external table. PPBO Load originated from SOL700. TOLBO Time output list originated from SOL700.

2287 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index GPECT Grid point element connection table. CPLDIN1 Multi-physics input datablock (UPVNLH from other physics). CPLDIN2 Multi-physics input datablock (SILS from other physics). CPLDIN3 Multi-physics input datablock. Plastic work vector for heat transfer pass. USETD from heat transfer for mechanical pass. UPVHY T emperature vectors for uncoupled analysis. OLBH List of time for uncoupled analysis KDIOF Index T able of element force for offset. KDELF Matrix of element force for offset. FSI For OpenFSI (fluid structure interaction with external fluid). HRMSP Grid point table for Herrmann and/or mDOF heat shell elements. OINT MDMIOUT and NLOUT bulk data entry information. DDUVA_FE Displacement increment between two consecutive newton Raphson iterations. -Velo-Accel coming from ADAMS. Only used if parameter extsys = 1 (ADAMS) QSPH0 Previous step SPC forces (used in statics PV checking). GEOM1S Table of bulk data entries related to geometry. GEOM2S Table of bulk data entries related to element connectivity and scalar points. MATPOOLS DMIG, fluid and radiation data. DYNAMICS Table of bulk data entries related to dynamics. DSGRID Design sensitivity grid point information. ESTINF Used only for distributed parallel NLEMG. FFOLPRE Follower force matrix of previous loadcase, to be used in unloading process. DTI Direct table input table. DTINDX Index of DTI. CSADMDB1 Integrator parameter and marker data passed to Nastran by Adams, for Adams- Nastran coupled simulation. NFDICT Dictionary of FENL. NLFTAB Nonlinear force table containing record of NLBSH3D, LBSH3DG cards. COSMDAT Data block of COSMDAT input at current load step. BCORFAM Family of Coriolis matrices for rotating frame rotor. KCNRFAM Family of centripetal matrices for rotating frame rotor. KFESNL Stiffness matrix due to enforced motion YS (fe-set).

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2288 Main Index KSSNL Stiffness matrix due to enforced motion YS (s-set). MKELMRX Advanced nonlinear backup-copy of MKELM for bisection. PMMOFLX Element offset processing. KDICOFLX KDELOFLX dictionary table. KDELOFLX T able of element stiffness matrices with updated element offset processing ROTORUSE Datablock containing rotor RGYRO, RSPINR, RSPINT information. BGPPF Rotor gyroscopic matrix. KCVPPF Circulation matrices due to RAYLEIGH, VISCOUS, and HYBRID (VISCOUS) damping. USET1X One of many USET tables. GPLS Grid point list. GEOM4S Constraints, DOF membership and rigid element connectivity table. EQEXINS Equivalence table between external and internal grid/scalar identification numbers for the superelement specified by SEID. USETPS USET from previous step. YSG1 T otal enforced motion matrix. PG Static load matrix (g-set). PKYG Matrix of equivalent static loads due to enforced displacement (g-set). PBYG Matrix of equivalent static loads due to enforced velocity (g-set). PMYG Matrix of equivalent static loads due to enforced acceleration (g-set). YRSG1 Matrix of enforced relative displacements (g-set). USET1V USET updated with constraints from upstream superelements. SLT T able of static loads. DLT0 T able of dynamic loads from previous loadcase. DLTV T able of dynamic loads. APPLODV Matrix of applied load amplitudes. DLT1V T able of dynamic loads updated for nonlinear analysis. SCSTM T able of global transformation matrices for superelements. MJJ Mass matrix (g-size). GMNV Multipoint constraint transformation matrix. BPPL1 Linear damping matrix. GPECTS Grid point element connection table. MPOOL T able of RADSET, RADLST , and RADMTX Bulk Data entry images. ECTS Element connection table.

2289 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index Output Data Block:GMFEV Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by fe-set). EST Element summary table. ESTL Linear element summary table. GPDTS Grid point definition table. ESTNC Nonlinear element summary table for matrix update. GEOM3 Table of Bulk Data entries related to static and thermal loads. CASECCY Case Control T able. UPVNLH Solution matrix from nonlinear analysis (p-set). QSVH Nonlinear element forces (s-set). ESTNLH Nonlinear element summary table at converged step. FPVH Matrix of element forces at the previous time step. OESNL1H Table of nonlinear element stresses in SORT1 format. PPNLH Nonlinear load (applied and NOLINi) matrix appended from each output time step. OTMH T ransient response time output list appended from each subcase. MUPVNL Solution matrix from nonlinear response analysis for matrix update (p-set). MESTNL Nonlinear element summary table for matrix update. BTOPCNV Updated contact regions input information table. BTOPSTF Updates contact regions topological information table. OESNLBH Table of slideline contact element stresses in SORT1 format. QMVH Nonlinear element forces (m-set). QPVH Nonlinear constraint forces DUPVH Displacement increment at the final iteration before exit. RPVH Load matrix (two columns) at the final iteration before exit. GEOM4CN Updated constraints for 3D contact. KFRIC Frictional stiffness for 3D contact. TELS Output time list (for NLTRAN only). QNV Quasi-Newton vectors (BFGS). OFCON3D 3D contact item codes. ORESV4 Material property table for thermal control mechanisms. LTF Lower triangular file of the solution matrix UPN. UTF Upper triangular file of the solution matrix UPN.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2290 Main Index PNLHN1 Nonlinear load matrix appended from each output time step (for NLTRAN only). QSVHI Matrix of nonlinear element forces FSV at constrained points at the output time steps (for NLTRAN only). PPNLHI Nonlinear load (applied and NOLINi) matrix PPL appended from each output time
step (for NLTRAN only). UPVNLHI Solution matrix UPVNLH from nonlinear analysis appended from each output time
step (for NLTRAN only). QMVHI Nonlinear element forces FMV appended from each output time step (m-set) (for NLTRAN only). ESTPRV Nonlinear element summary table from previous time step. Saved ESTCON data for
re-entering usage. For itrfmt=7, ESTCON is the input ESTNL file of NLEMG for the last time step. For itrfmt<>7, it is the output (ESTNL) of NLEMG for the last time step. Both are used in stiffness updating to the previous converged time step MESTNL0 Initial nonlinear element summary table at each STEP case. UPVNLH0 Initial solution matrix from nonlinear analysis at each STEP case. FENL1 Matrix of strain energy and grid point force at every element at the last converged load step. RBEQMG The g-size equivalent MPC force matrix for nonlinear RBE. KELMSV Saved KELMNL for stiffness updating to previous time step with itrfmt=7. HGGTH [Hgg]T for 3D contact. N3DSAVH Save the useful data of 3D contact at the final iteration before exit. ESTMG Advanced nonlinear element connectivity and type data. GRPSTM Advanced nonlinear element group information. MTSTM Advanced nonlinear ints array, including some materials data. MTSTM1 Advanced nonlinear materials data. MTSTM2 Advanced nonlinear materials pointers. MTSTM3 Advanced nonlinear materials flag. MTSTM4 Advanced nonlinear materials dimensioning data. MMTX Advanced nonlinear element stresses and strains updated state. MMTXR Advanced nonlinear element stresses and strains reference state, matching MMTX. MMTX1 Advanced nonlinear element iterative data. NLVECM Advanced nonlinear vectors. VCCTM Advanced nonlinear VCCT data. GCOMM Advanced nonlinear common blocks. GCOMMR Advanced nonlinear backup-copy of GCOMM for bisection. MKELM Advanced nonlinear element stiffnesses to be passed to EMG.

2291 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index MRELM Advanced nonlinear element RHS to be passed to NL3INC. MKELMR Advanced nonlinear backup-copy of MKELM for bisection. N3DDB00 3D contact database for multiple subcases. N3DDBIH 3D contact database for cutback. HGGTI 3D contact database for cutback - [Hgg]T. ESTLNS Nonlinear elements summary table. OFVCCT Output table for VCCT. UDEFSFD Input/Output. Contains records for user defined NLRSFD. FRICEL Friction stiffness elements (for 3D contact) BSHGGT For BSQUEAL only - [Hgg]T BSKGGN For BSQUEAL only - K_normal. BSKGGF For BSQUEAL only - K_fric. CIDATA Carry data for C.I. KTPPSV KTPP saved when using matrix-based iterative solver. GCOMMRD GCOMM for advanced nonlinear elements used for dynamic back-up MMTXRD MMTX for advanced nonlinear elements used for dynamic back-up. OCOMPH Composite Layer output for advanced nonlinear elements. OCOMPMH Composite Max / Min output for advanced nonlinear elements. ONLOUTS NLOUT scalar quantities. ONLOUTV NLOUT vector quantities. ONLOUTT NLOUT tensor quantities. CPLDOUT1 Multi-physics output datablock. Not used for heat transfer pass. Plastic Work Vector for Mechanical Pass. FSIXF For OpenFSI (fluid structure interaction with external fluid). OFDBGDT Debug post item codes. ROTDATH Rotor dynamic data. R_FE Matrix of residual vector in (fe-set) (used by ADAMS (CHEETAH). RBEQMGI RBEQMG appended from each output time step (for NLTRAN only) ESTINFX Output data block. Used only for distributed parallel NLEMG. EIDPID Datablock with mapping of EID and its corresponding PID. FFOLLOT Follower force matrix of current loadcase, to be used for unloading process of the next loadcase.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2292 Main Index OFCON3DI OFCON3D appended from each output time step (for NLTRAN). OEFNL1H T able of nonlinear element forces for CWELD/CFAST in SORT1 format. CSDOFA2N [6*csnmrk,1] vector of 0’s/1’s indicating if an Adams DOF is in Nastran fe-set.
Used for Adams-Nastran coupled simulation. CSA2FE [fesize,1] vector of 0 (a-set) and 1 (o-set). Used for Adams-Nastran coupled simulation. OFCRFM Cohesive contact item codes. OFGCON Global contact item codes. OFCRFMI Cohesive contact item codes (for NLTRAN only when NLPACK <> 1). OFGCONI Global contact item codes (for NLTRAN only when NLPACK <> 1). N3DFRC Save the friction force of 3D contact at the final iteration. N3DCTC Save the contact force of 3D contact at the final iteration. OBCNURB Analytical spline of DEFORM BCBODYs. OBCNURBI Analytical spline of DEFORM BCBODYs (for NLTRAN only when NLPACK <> 1). FINERT1 Matrix of inertia force. FDAMPI1 Matrix of damping force. FENL1I FENL1 for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. N3DFRCI N3DFRC for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. N3DCTCI N3DCTC for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. FINERTI FINERT1 for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. FDAMPII FDAMPI1 for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. OCNTCHK Contact status check of GRIDs. OCNTCHKI OCNTCHK for NLTRAN only NLPACK <> 1. OFPMDPOS OFP data position for modules. KDELML Element Kd-mat for linear elements. KDDICTL Element Kd-mat dictionary for linear elements. KDELMNL Element Kd-mat for non-linear elements. KDDICTNL Element Kd-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. KDGG1 Differential stiffness for linear elements. KDGGX Differential stiffness for nonlinear elements. KTGG Stiffness matrix in g-size. BGYROPP Gyroscopic damping matrix. KGYROPP Gyroscopic stiffness matrix. BCORPPX Family of Coriolis matrices for rotating frame rotor. KCNRPPX Family of centripetal matrices for rotating frame rotor.

2293 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index GPLD External grid/scalar/extra point identification number list. USET1Z USET updated with constraints from upstream superelements. GMNZ Multipoint constraint transformation matrix. SILD Scalar index list ( p-set). XUSETD Degree-of-freedom set membership table (p-set). XDLT Dynamic Loads Table. XNLFT Nonlinear forcing table. XEQDYN Dynamics equivalence internal to external table. XAPPLOD Matrix of applied load amplitudes. XENFLODK Matrix of equivalent enforced motion load amplitudes due to stiffness effects. XENFLODB Matrix of equivalent enforced motion load amplitudes due to viscous damping effects XENFLODM Matrix of equivalent enforced motion load amplitudes due to mass effects XENFMOTN Matrix of enforced motion amplitudes XUDEFSFD Auxiliary data for user-defined subroutine for NLRSFD Bulk Data entry. XENFMTNR Matrix of enforced relative displacements (g-set). XGMNE Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by ne-set). XGMS Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by s-set). XGMFE Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by fe-set). ELDATAH Table of combined nonlinear information data. ZDLT1 Table of dynamic loads updated for nonlinear analysis. GPTT1 Table of grid point temperatures (for transient analysis only). ESTLT Combine ESTL and the temperature load related data from ELDATA. DLT1COM Dynamic load table for follower forces. DLT1PRE Table of previous dynamic loads. KFELM Element FF K-mat for non-linear elements. KFDICT Element FF K-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. KFGG Follower force stiffness. KELMNL Stiffness matrix for nonlinear elements. KDICTNL Element K-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. BELMNL Element B-mat for non-linear elements. BDICTNL Element B-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. BGGNL Nonlinear damping matrix. K4GGNL Nonlinear material stiffness for structural damping. UGNIX Displacement matrix at converged step (g-set).

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2294 Main Index RDEST Radiation element summary table. RDESTR T otal RDEST . RECM Radiation exchange coefficient matrix. RECMR Total RECM. RGG Radiation transfer matrix. MFEFEZ Mass matrix (or radiation matrix for heat transfer), (fe-set). BPPL Damping matrix, or heat capacitance matrix, for linear elements (p-set). BPP Damping matrix, or heat capacitance matrix (p-set). KDIOF Element offset processing. KDELF Matrix of element force for offset. KPPLZ Stiffness matrix for linear elements (p-set). S2SCGGNZ Normal constraint Matrix of segment-to-segment glued contact in g-size. S2SCGGTZ T angential constraint Matrix of segment-to-segment glued contact in g-size. BGGL1 Damping matrix (g-set). KDFEFE Sum of differential stiffness and follower stiffness (fe-set). KDFESNL Partition of KDFEFE (fe-set by s-set). KDSSNL Partition of KDFEFE (s-set by s-set). BPPX Damping matrix, or heat capacitance matrix (p-set). KPPT T angential Stiffness (p-set). KPPLX Stiffness matrix for linear elements (p-set). KFEFE T angential stiffness (fe-set). KFESNL Stiffness matrix due to enforced motion YS (fe-set). KSSNL Stiffness matrix due to enforced motion YS (s-set). BFEFE Damping matrix, or heat capacitance matrix (fe-set). MMPZ Mass matrix (m-set by p-set). MSPZ Mass matrix (s-set by p-set). MBFEPZ Updated mass matrix (fe-set by p-set). MFEFINVZ Inverse of mass matrix (fe-set). CASECCP Selected records of CASECC assigned to local processor. GEOM3CS Updated GEOM3 with initial temperatures from cosim.

2295 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index Parameters: KRATIO Input/output-complex-default=(1.,0.). Stiffness ratio used for time step adjustment. CONV Input/output-integer-default=0. Nonlinear analysis convergence flag. On input: 0 Initialization On output: -1 Convergence has not been achieved. 1 Convergence has been achieved. STIMEX Input/output-real-default=0.0. On initial input, starting time step and on output, accumulated time used for restarts. NEWP Output-integer-default=0. New SUBCASE or STEP case FLAG. -1 Current case has not been completed. 1 Current case has been completed. NEWK Input/output-integer-default=0. Stiffness update flag. -1 Do not update stiffness.

0 Update stiffness and represents the number of consecutive time steps which have shown divergence. If this number reaches 5, the solution process is terminated. OLDDT Input/output-real-default=0.0. Time step increment used in the previous iteration or
time step to be used after the matrix update or subcase switch. NSTEP Input/output-integer-default=0. Current time step position for the current STEP case, set to 0 at the beginning of the STEP case. LGDISP0 Input/output-integer-default=0. Large displacement and follower force flag. -1 No large displacement and follower force effects will be considered. 1 Large displacement and follower force effects will be considered. 2 Only large displacement effects will be considered. Displacement effects will be considered. CONSEC Input/output-integer-default=0. A composite number equal to 10*value of NSTEP the last time MAXBIS was reached) + (the number of consecutive time steps which have reached MAXBIS. If CONSEC=10, the solution process is terminated. ITERID Input/output-integer-default=0. Nonlinear analysis iteration count. ITIME Input-real-default=0.0. Initial time step at the beginning of a current STEP case. KTIME Input/output-integer-default=0. CPU time remaining. If KTIME is positive then KTIME is the time remaining at the start of the stiffness update. If negative, no stiffness update was done since the last exit from NLITER. KTIME still holds the negative of the stiffness update time from the last stiffness update.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2296 Main Index LASTUPD Input/output-integer-default=0. The time step number of the last stiffness update at:

previous converged solution. < an intermediate iteration of the current time step. =1 the last iteration. NOGONL Output-integer-default=0. Nonlinear “no-go” flag. Set to +1 to continue or -1 to terminate. NBIS Input/output-integer-default=0. Current bisection counter. MAXLP Input-integer-default=0. Maximum limit allowed for element relaxation iteration and the material subincrement processes. TSTATNEW Input-integer-default=-1. Static analysis flag. -1 ANALYSIS=NLTRAN. 1 ANALYSIS<>NLTRAN; STATIC solutions (Set to 1 to ignore inertia and damping forces, old one.) LANGLES Input-integer-default=1. Large rotation calculation method. 1 Gimbal angle 2 Left rotation vector Right rotation vector. NDAMP Input-real-default=0. Numerical damping. TABS Input-real-default=0.0. Absolute temperature conversion. For example, set to 273.16 when specifying temperatures in Celsius or 459.69 in Fahrenheit. SIGMA Input-real-default=0.0. The Stefan-Boltzmann constant. Used to compute radiant heat flux. NORADMAT Input-integer-default=0. Radiation flag -2 No radiation -1 Initial radiation 1 Single band radiation with constant emissivity 2 Radiation with temperature dependent emissivity 3 Multiple band radiation with constant emissivity ADPCONX Input-real-default=1.0. Contact penalty value. Scale factor for adjusting penalty values on restart. Update penalty values if positive. PBCONT Input-integer-default=0. Slideline contact flag. NBCONT Input/output-integer-default=0. Number of bisections due to slideline contact. M3DMPC Input-integer. 3D contact with MPC flag. < 0 No 3D contact or 3D contact with Lagrange multipliers ≥ 0 3D contact with MPC equations

2297 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index MNEWK Input/output-integer-default=1. Matrix update flag for 3D contact. ≤ 0 Matrix update not required by 3D contact

0 Matrix update required by 3D contact OFLAG Input/output-integer-default=0. Output control flag. On input: < 0 Print the title lines for iteration message and/or print the output only information before exiting ≥ 0 Do not print the title lines for iteration message On output: = 0 No output exit ≥ 1 Output on exit TANALY Input-character-default=’ ‘. Type of nonlinear analysis. ‘NLTR’ Nonlinear transient ‘NLST’ Nonlinear statics ‘LNST’ Linear statics ‘STATICS’ SOL 101 Linear statics FKSYMFAC Input-real-default=1.0. Follower stiffness symmetry actor tolerance. Usually input by user parameter. RSTFLG Input-integer-default=-1. Restart flag. ≤ 0 Cold start run = 1 Restart run NLPACK Input-integer-default=100. Nonlinear transient analysis append flag. ≤ 0 Append all output time steps together in each STEP case before processing the output procedure 0 Append the value of NLPACK output time steps together in each STEP case before output procedure. GPFORCE Input-integer-no default. The number of columns in FENL. If GPFORCE less than or equal to zero then no GPFORCE or ESE command is present. GNLSTN Input-integer-no default. Geometric nonlinear strain flag. Usually input by user parameter. 0 Small strain 1 Green strain MSCHGZ Input-integer-default=-1 . Boundary condition change flag. ≤ 0 No change 0 Changed

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2298 Main Index K6ROT Input-real. Scaling factor of the penalty stiffness to be added to the normal rotation for QUAD4 and TRIA3. WTMASS Input-real-default=1.0. Scale factor on structural mass matrix. TSTATIC Input-integer-default=-1. Static analysis flag. Coming from the PARAM TSTATIC entry. In SOL 129, this flag will make code work like a nonlinear static analysis. In SOL 400, this flag is used when ANALYSIS=NLTRAN and it still works like a nonlinear transient analysis but ignore all mass and damping matrices. -1 Normal dynamic solution 1 Normal dynamic solution, ignoring inertia and damping STIMEF Output-real-default=0.0. Time to update follower stiffness. STEPCUR Input-integer-no default. Current STEP case number in current SUBCASE. This value is initialized at the beginning of each SUBCASE. STEPNXT
TANALOLDInput-character-default=’ ‘. Analysis type of previous step. ITOPTX Input-Integer- Default=1. Element-based solver options flag. -2 Determine whether element-based solver is selected for use -1 Determine whether any element-based solver restrictions have been violated

0 A combination of bit values used to select solver options as follows: Bit Value Option 0 0 Run solver with all defaults 1 1 Use CASI solver 2 2 Use VKI solver 3 4 Reserved 4 8 Reserved 5 16 Reserved 6 32 Reserved 7 64 Use open core for solver memory 8 128 Generate intermediate diagnostics 9 256 Use alternate PCG method 10 512 CASI - reduce i/o 11 1024 CASI - adapt PCG 12 2048 CASI - do not use implicit elements

2299 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index CASPIV Input- real-default=1.0e-10. Pivot threshold for CASI PCG factorization. LMTOPTX Input- integer-default=0. Lagrange to MPC transform and equation solver options. 1 T ransform LMT to MPC 2 Use element-based iterative solver 4 Use matrix-based iterative solver AUTOMSC1 Input- real-default=10.0. Scaling value for Auto-Mset. AUTOMSC2 . Input- real-default=0.01. LMT T ransformation HGGTOUT Input-Integer-Default=0. Flag for immediate output of HGGT matrix without doing any nonlinear operation 0 Do regular nonlinear solution operations 1 Generate HGGT matrix and exit immediately NDAMPM Input-real-default=0.0. Numerical parameter for GEN-ALPHA. LASTCNMU Input/output-real-default=0.0. Last converged value of MU. LSTEP Input/output-integer-default=0. Load step. RSTEP Input/output-integer-default=0. The count of controlled increments. ARCLG Input/output-real-default=0. The arc length at the last converged step. ARCSGN Input/output-integer-default=0.0. The sign of P DOT DELP at the beginning of the subcase. This is used in RESTARTS in the post-buckling region. G,W3,W4 Input/output-real-default=0. Scale factors for use in preparing damping matrix (CASI). NLIC Input/output-real-default=0. T rue if NLIC presents. NLICFLG Input/output-real-default=0. T rue if NLIC presents first time. STIMEHSC Input/output-integer-default=0.0. Offset to the initial time(itime) for heat-structure chaining analysis. HGENPLAS Input-real-default=0.0. Plastic work to heat conversion factor. MAXRATIO Input/output-real-default=0. Maximum ratio of KAA diag to factor diag B input matrix considered nearly singular PARTI Input/output-integer-default=0. For model partition. MPCPCH Input-integer-default=0. Unused. ASSEMK Input-integer-default=0. Flag used in conjunction with CASI solver that determines whether the older technique of having assembled global stiffness matrix and partitions present or the new technique of having only element matrices available is used during LMT operations. If ASSEMK<0, assembled matrices are available. NLOOPH Input-integer-default=0. Loop number of selected temperature results in thermal database.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2300 Main Index ICPLD Input-integer-default=1. Multi-physics pass number. 1 Heat 2 Mechanical NUMCPLD Input-integer-default=1. Number of multi-physics passes in step. NEWCPLD Input-integer-default=0. Flag to indicate change in multi-physics pass. 0 No change 1 Change in physics NBISCPLD Input-integer-default=0. Number of bisections for multi-physics analysis. NCPLOOP Input-integer-default=1. Loop number of coupled analysis. HGENFRIC Input-real-default=0.0. Frictional work to heat conversion factor. DTCPLD Input-real-default=0.0. Unused. TOTALTIM Input-real-default=1.0. T otal time of the load step. OPENFSI Input-integer-default=0. Direction of pressures. LGDISP Input-integer-default=0. Large displacement flag input by user. EXTSYS Input/output-integer-default=0. Communication flag between Adams and NLSOLV. 0 Regular Nastran run

0 NLFE-MBS external system 1 Iteration mode 2 Bisection is requested, the time increment is cut in half 9 Activate the convergence processing NSTPCPLD Output-integer-default=0. Flag for zeroth inc. for statics in multi-physics -1 Zeroth increment ≥ 1 Regular increments ITMPCPLD Input-integer-default=0. Flag for initial temperature for the 0th increment for statics. 2 Zero initial temperature 3 Specified initial temperature NUMCPLDY Input-integer-default=1. Number of multi-physics passes in subcase. STIMERT Output-real-default=0.0. Time at end of each loadcase. CSFLG Input-integer-default=0. Coupled solution control flag. CSDBG Input-integer-default=0. Coupled solution debug flag. CSNMRK Input-integer-default=0. Number of Adams-Nastran shared markers. LCFACT Output-real-default=0.0. Factor to reduce Adams time step. CSERROR Output-integer-default=0. Error info message number. CSALPHAH Input-real-default=0.0. HHT Alpha parameter from Adams.

2301 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index CSBETAH Input-real-default=0.0. HHT Beta parameter from Adams. CSGAMMAH Input-real-default=0.0. HHT Gamma parameter from Adams. CSCONCD Output-integer-default=-1. Contact code flag. IMPFID Input-integer-default=0. Imperfection ID. ANALYCHN Input-character-default=’ ‘. Analysis type. COSMID Input-integer-default=0. ID of COSMSEL in case control. INICNT Input-integer-default=0. Flag of the first BCONTACT in the current subcase. 0 Not the first BCONTACT 1 It is the first BCONTACT in the current subcase NOETT Input-integer-default=0. Flag for the presence of ETT data block. 0 No ETT present - create one for cosim T-load. 1 ETT present - modify with temperatures received from cosim. ISWITCH Input/output-integer-default=0. Code flow control flag. DBGLVL Input-integer-default=0. Debug print level. TSTATOLD Input-integer-default=-1. Same as TSTATNEW but for previous STEP . LGSET Input-character. Name of the g-set including Lagrange multipliers. LPSET Input-character. Name of the p-set including Lagrange multipliers. NLRIGID Input-integer-default=0. Lagrangian rigid elements existence flag.

0 Lagrangian elements exist. <1 Lagrangian elements do not exist. LUSETS Input-integer-default=0. The number of degrees-of-freedom in the g-set of the current superelement. RADMOD Input-character-default=YES. Modify radiation matrix to avoid temperature overshoot. MPCF1 Input-integer-default=-1. OAPWR1 generation flag. +1 OAPWR1 is generated -1 OAPWR1 is not generated NOOSETX Input-integer-no default. Number of degrees-of-freedom in the o-set or omitted degree-of-freedom flag. Set to -1 if there are none. NGPSP Input-integer-default=0. GPSP module execution counter. MSCHGX Input-integer-default=0. MPC or SPC change flag. GPSP Input-logical-default=false. Grid point singularity processing. NNEW Input-integer. The number of new m-set and s-set degrees-of-freedom. NNEWS Input-integer. The number of new s-set degrees-of-freedom. NNEWM Input-integer. The number of new m-set degrees-of-freedom.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2302 Main Index MSCHGY Input-integer-default=0. MPC or SPC change flag. ATSPCOLD Output-character-default=’ ‘. Previous value of AUTOSPC. RSTRT Input-integer-default=-1. Restart flag. <=0 Cold start = 1 RSONLY RSONLY Input-logical-no default. Residual structure only flag. FALSE Superelements are specified. TRUE Superelements are not specified. SPCGEN Input-integer-default=0. SPC Bulk Data entry punch flag. If set to >0, then ingularities identified are written to the PUNCH file as SPC Bulk Data entries. EPPRT Input-real-default=0.0. Singularity print parameter. Singularities greater than EPPRT will not be printed if PRGPST=‘YES’. EPZERO Input-real-default=1.E-8. Singularity test parameter. Singularities greater than EPZERO will not be constrained. PRGPST Input-character-default=‘YES’. Singularity summary print flag. If set to ‘YES’, then the summary is printed. LLSET Input-character. Name of the l-set including Lagrange multipliers. XAUTOMST Input-character. AUTOMSET selection flag. If YES, then the dependent degree-of- freedom specifications on MPC and rigid element Bulk Data entries will be rearranged to avoid exclusive DOF set conflicts. Usually input by user parameter. AUTOSPCR Input-character-default =NO. Requests that stiffness singularities and near singularities be automatically constrained after all residual SPC and MPC constraints are processed. NLHEAT Input-logical-default=false. Heat transfer analysis flag. TLSETOLD Output-integer-default=0. Previous TEMPERATURE(LOAD or BOTH) set identification. LUSETD Input-integer-default=0. The number of degrees-of-freedom in the p-set. DELDBFLG Input-integer-default=0. Datablock deletion flag. KDFLTGEN Input-integer-default=0. Filtered differential stiffness matrix flag. LOADFACR Input-real-default=1.0. Load factor in nonlinear static analysis. Same as LOADFAC except real. N3DCONT Input-integer. N3Dcont=-1 if BCONTACT exists. MSGCNT Input-integer. The maximum number of the same error message to be printed. LSETID Input-integer-default=0. LOAD set ID. PLSETID Input-integer-default=0. Previous LOAD set ID. NLBUCK Input-integer. Nonlinear Buckling flag.

item.title: User's Manual P117
item.description:
2303 NMINCIT NLPERF incremental analysis module Main Index IANLCHNG Input-integer-default=0. Analysis chaining type. NLDIFF Input-integer-default=0. Flag to determine whether the differential stiffness matrix and follower force stiffness are to be computed for nonlinear elements NOULNTH Input-integer-default=0. ULNTH presence flag. MARCELM Input-logical-default =false. Flag for the presence of advanced nonlinear elements in the analysis. IRGYRO Input-integer-default=0. ID of the RGYRO entry. GYROTAN Input-integer-default=-1. Control flag for gyroscopic terms in nonlinear transient rotordynamic analysis. Default is to include gyroscope effects. S400S2S Input-logical-default=false. Signal of SOL400. S2SKPPL Input-logical-default=false. Segment-to-segment p-set stiffness flag. APP Input-character-no default. Analysis type. Allowable types are: ‘STATICS’ Linear Statics ‘REIG’ Normal Modes ‘FREQRESP’ Frequency Response ‘TRANRESP’ T ransient Response ‘NLST’ Nonlinear Static MGE Input/output-integer-default=0. Multiple structural damping flag. for PSHELL, BUSH and PBUSHT property entries. ALPHA2 Output-real. Scale factor for stiffness portion of Rayleigh damping. MSCHGX0 MSCHGX Input-integer-default=0. MPC or SPC change flag. ECHG Input-logical-default =false. Parameter that indicates whether the UE-set length has changed. LNSET Input-character. Name of the n-set including Lagrange multipliers. LNESET Input-character. Name of the ne-set including Lagrange multipliers. USETPRT Input-integer-default=-1. Controls the tabular printout of the structural DOF sets. USETSEL Input-integer-default=0. Specifies the sets which will be printed in the row sort. USETSTR1 Input-character-default’ ‘. Specifies the sets that will be printed by the specification of parameters USETPRT and USETSEL. USETSTR2 Input-character-default’ ‘. Specifies the sets that will be printed by the specification of parameters USETPRT and USETSEL. USETSTR3 Input-character-default’ ‘. Specifies the sets that will be printed by the specification of parameters USETPRT and USETSEL. USETSTR4 Input-character-default’ ‘. Specifies the sets that will be printed by the specification of parameters USETPRT and USETSEL. FOLLOWK0 Input-Integer. Follower force stiffness parameter.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF incremental analysis module2304 Main Index LFESET Input-character. Name of the fe-set including Lagrange multipliers. FKDIAG Input-integer-default=0. Follower stiffness null diagonal flag. Similar to KDIAG. PRDSLV Input-integer-default=0. Control flag for Pardiso solver. NOPSET Input-integer-default=0. P-set existence flag. KDIAG Input-real-default=-1.0. Eliminates spurious mechanisms and singularities in the onlinear stiffness matrix. KDIAGS Input-integer-default. Local saved value of KDIAG. MDSTAT Input-logical-default =false. DOMAINSOLVER STAT flag. HTSYMFAC Input-real-default=0.0. Heat transfer matrix symmetrization coefficient. HTPCONVM Input-integer-default=0. Heat transfer matrix symmetrization flag. HTSYM Input-integer-default=0. Controls the decomposition method for SOL 400 thermal analysis. ASING Input-integer-default=0. Specifies the action to take when singularities (null rows and columns) exist in static or dynamic matrices. INITX Input-logical-default =false. Flag for the presence of mass matrix. NRNENC Output-integer. Set to -1 if the number of null rows does not equal the number of null columns OLDM2PP Input-integer-default=0. M2PP direct mass input in case control.

2305 NMINFOR Processes model information to find the number of different element types in the model Main Index Processes model information from different element summary tables to find the number of linear elements, the number of conventional nonlinear elements, the number of advanced nonlinear as well as the total number of elements in the model and store them as global variables Format: Input Data Blocks: Output Data Blocks: None. Parameter: None.NMINFOR Processes model information to find the number of different element types in the model NMINFOR EST,ESTL,ESTM,ESTNL,N2M/ $ EST Element summary table. ESTL Linear element summary table. ESTM Advanced nonlinear elements summary table. ESTLN Nonlinear element summary table. N2M Advanced elements in model.

2307 NMINIT NLPERF initialization module Main Index Input Data Block: CASEXX Subset of CASECC for current STEP case. PPTNL Applied load vectors. YSH Matrix of enforced displacements. ELDATAH Table of combined nonlinear information data. KELMNL Stiffness matrix for nonlinear elements. KPPLX Stiffness matrix for linear elements (p-set). GMNE Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by ne-set). MPTS Material properties table. DITS Direct input tables. KFEFE Tangential stiffness (fe-set). DLT1COM Dynamic load table for follower forces. CSTMS Coordinate system transformation matrices. BGPDTS Basic grid point definition table. SILS Scalar index list. USETD Displacement set definition table (p-set). BFEFE Damping matrix (or nonlinear tangential heat capacitance matrix), (fe-set). MFEFE Mass matrix (or radiation matrix for heat transfer), (fe-set). NLFT Nonlinear forcing table. RDEST Radiation element summary table. RECM Radiation exchange coefficient matrix. BPP Damping matrix (or heat capacitance matrix) for linear elements (p-set). GPSNTS Grid point shell normal table. DITID Table of ID numbers in DIT . DEQIND Index table to DEQATN for CBUSH1 shock absorber. DEQATN Table of DEQATN for CBUSH1 shock absorber. MPP Mass matrix (p-set). MBSP Updated mass matrix (s-set). MBFEP Updated mass matrix (fe-set by p-set). MMP Mass matrix (m-set by p-set). GMFE Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by fe-set). GMS Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by s-set). MFEFEI Matrix of right pseudo-inverse.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF initialization module2308 Main Index RMPTQM Not used GEOM4 Constraints, DOF membership and rigid element connectivity table. KPPT T angential Stiffness (p-set). YVH Matrix of enforced velocities. YAH Matrix of enforced accelerations. GPTT1 T able of grid point temperatures (for transient analysis only). EPTS Element Property Table. TMLD T able of loads for non-linear transient analysis. ROTORT T able of rotordynamics user input for transient analysis. BGFAM Family of gyroscopic matrices (p-set). KCFAM Family of circulation matrices (p-set). ENZGD T able of unbalance terms in rotor dynamics. CONTACT Contact regions specification table ACTNODS T able of all active nodes. ESTLT Combine ESTL and the temperature load related data from ELDATA. N2M Advanced elements in model. KDFEFE Sum of differential stiffness and follower stiffness. RGNL Original RG matrix used for LMT transformation. YM Non-homogeneous MPC coefficients for LMT transformation. KDICT0 Element K-mat dictionary for linear elements. KELEM0 Element K-mat for linear elements. KDICTNL Element K-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. K2PPCAS Direct matrix input for stiffness. KDDICTL Element Kd-mat dictionary for linear elements. KDELML Element Kd-mat for linear elements. KDDICTNL Element Kd-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. KDELMNL Element Kd-mat for non-linear elements. KFDICT Element FF K-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. KFELM Element FF K-mat for non-linear elements. BKDICT Element K-mat dictionary for non-linear contact elements. BKELM Element K-mat for non-linear contact elements. EDT T able used to read RDITER for iterative solver. MDICT0 Element M-mat dictionary for linear elements. MELM0 Element M-mat for linear elements.

2309 NMINIT NLPERF initialization module Main Index BDICT0 Element B-mat dictionary for linear elements. BELM0 Element B-mat for linear elements. BDICTNL Element B-mat dictionary for non-linear elements. BELMNL Element B-mat for non-linear elements. M2PPCAS Direct matrix input for mass. B2PPCAS Direct matrix input for damping. EQDYN Dynamics equivalence internal to external table. PPBO Load originated from SOL700. TOLBO Time output list originated from SOL700. GPECT Grid point element connection table. CPLDIN1 Multi-physics input datablock (UPVNLH from other physics). CPLDIN2 Multi-physics input datablock (SILS from other physics). CPLDIN3 Multi-physics input datablock. Plastic work vector for heat transfer pass. USETD from heat transfer for mechanical pass. UPVHY T emperature vectors for uncoupled analysis. OLBH List of time for uncoupled analysis KDIOF Index T able of element force for offset. KDELF Matrix of element force for offset. FSI For OpenFSI (fluid structure interaction with external fluid). HRMSP Grid point table for Herrmann and/or mDOF heat shell elements. OINT MDMIOUT and NLOUT bulk data entry information. DDUVA_FE Displacement increment between two consecutive newton Raphson iterations. -Velo-Accel coming from ADAMS. Only used if parameter extsys = 1 (ADAMS) QSPH0 Previous step SPC forces (used in statics PV checking). GEOM1S Table of bulk data entries related to geometry. GEOM2S Table of bulk data entries related to element connectivity and scalar points. MATPOOLS DMIG, fluid and radiation data. DYNAMICS Table of bulk data entries related to dynamics. DSGRID Design sensitivity grid point information. ESTINF Used only for distributed parallel NLEMG. FFOLPRE Follower force matrix of previous loadcase, to be used in unloading process. DTI Direct table input table.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF initialization module2310 Main Index DTINDX Index of DTI. CSADMDB1 Integrator parameter and marker data passed to Nastran by Adams, for Adams- Nastran coupled simulation. NFDICT Dictionary of FENL. NLFTAB Nonlinear force table containing record of NLBSH3D, LBSH3DG cards. COSMDAT Data block of COSMDAT input at current load step. BCORFAM Family of Coriolis matrices for rotating frame rotor. KCNRFAM Family of centripetal matrices for rotating frame rotor. KFESNL Stiffness matrix due to enforced motion YS (fe-set). KSSNL Stiffness matrix due to enforced motion YS (s-set).

2311 NMINIT NLPERF initialization module Main Index Output Data Block: UPVNLH Solution matrix from nonlinear analysis (p-set). QSVH Nonlinear element forces (s-set). ESTNLH Nonlinear element summary table at converged step. FPVH Matrix of element forces at the previous time step. OESNL1H Table of nonlinear element stresses in SORT1 format. PPNLH Nonlinear load (applied and NOLINi) matrix appended from each output time step. OTMH T ransient response time output list appended from each subcase. MUPVNL Solution matrix from nonlinear response analysis for matrix update (p-set). MESTNL Nonlinear element summary table for matrix update. BTOPCNV Updated contact regions input information table. BTOPSTF Updates contact regions topological information table. OESNLBH Table of slideline contact element stresses in SORT1 format. QMVH Nonlinear element forces (m-set). QPVH Nonlinear constraint forces DUPVH Displacement increment at the final iteration before exit. RPVH Load matrix (two columns) at the final iteration before exit. GEOM4CN Updated constraints for 3D contact. KFRIC Frictional stiffness for 3D contact. TELS Output time list (for NLTRAN only). QNV Quasi-Newton vectors (BFGS). OFCON3D 3D contact item codes. ORESV4 Material property table for thermal control mechanisms. LTF Lower triangular file of the solution matrix UPN. UTF Upper triangular file of the solution matrix UPN. PNLHN1 Nonlinear load matrix appended from each output time step (for NLTRAN only). QSVHI Matrix of nonlinear element forces FSV at constrained points at the output time steps (for NLTRAN only). PPNLHI Nonlinear load (applied and NOLINi) matrix PPL appended from each output time
step (for NLTRAN only). UPVNLHI Solution matrix UPVNLH from nonlinear analysis appended from each output time
step (for NLTRAN only). QMVHI Nonlinear element forces FMV appended from each output time step (m-set) (for NLTRAN only).

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF initialization module2312 Main Index ESTPRV Nonlinear element summary table from previous time step. Saved ESTCON data for
re-entering usage. For itrfmt=7, ESTCON is the input ESTNL file of NLEMG for the last time step. For itrfmt<>7, it is the output (ESTNL) of NLEMG for the last time step. Both are used in stiffness updating to the previous converged time step MESTNL0 Initial nonlinear element summary table at each STEP case. UPVNLH0 Initial solution matrix from nonlinear analysis at each STEP case. FENL1 Matrix of strain energy and grid point force at every element at the last converged load step. RBEQMG The g-size equivalent MPC force matrix for nonlinear RBE. KELMSV Saved KELMNL for stiffness updating to previous time step with itrfmt=7. HGGTH [Hgg]T for 3D contact. N3DSAVH Save the useful data of 3D contact at the final iteration before exit. ESTMG Advanced nonlinear element connectivity and type data. GRPSTM Advanced nonlinear element group information. MTSTM Advanced nonlinear ints array, including some materials data. MTSTM1 Advanced nonlinear materials data. MTSTM2 Advanced nonlinear materials pointers. MTSTM3 Advanced nonlinear materials flag. MTSTM4 Advanced nonlinear materials dimensioning data. MMTX Advanced nonlinear element stresses and strains updated state. MMTXR Advanced nonlinear element stresses and strains reference state, matching MMTX. MMTX1 Advanced nonlinear element iterative data. NLVECM Advanced nonlinear vectors. VCCTM Advanced nonlinear VCCT data. GCOMM Advanced nonlinear common blocks. GCOMMR Advanced nonlinear backup-copy of GCOMM for bisection. MKELM Advanced nonlinear element stiffnesses to be passed to EMG. MRELM Advanced nonlinear element RHS to be passed to NL3INC. MKELMR Advanced nonlinear backup-copy of MKELM for bisection. N3DDB00 3D contact database for multiple subcases. N3DDBIH 3D contact database for cutback. HGGTI 3D contact database for cutback - [Hgg]T. ESTLNS Nonlinear elements summary table. OFVCCT Output table for VCCT . UDEFSFD Input/Output. Contains records for user defined NLRSFD.

2313 NMINIT NLPERF initialization module Main Index FRICEL Friction stiffness elements (for 3D contact) BSHGGT For BSQUEAL only - [Hgg]T BSKGGN For BSQUEAL only - K_normal. BSKGGF For BSQUEAL only - K_fric. CIDATA Carry data for C.I. KTPPSV KTPP saved when using matrix-based iterative solver. GCOMMRD GCOMM for advanced nonlinear elements used for dynamic back-up MMTXRD MMTX for advanced nonlinear elements used for dynamic back-up. OCOMPH Composite Layer output for advanced nonlinear elements. OCOMPMH Composite Max / Min output for advanced nonlinear elements. ONLOUTS NLOUT scalar quantities. ONLOUTV NLOUT vector quantities. ONLOUTT NLOUT tensor quantities. CPLDOUT1 Multi-physics output datablock. Not used for heat transfer pass. Plastic Work Vector for Mechanical Pass. FSIXF For OpenFSI (fluid structure interaction with external fluid). OFDBGDT Debug post item codes. ROTDATH Rotor dynamic data. R_FE Matrix of residual vector in (fe-set) (used by ADAMS (CHEETAH). RBEQMGI RBEQMG appended from each output time step (for NLTRAN only) ESTINFX Output data block. Used only for distributed parallel NLEMG. EIDPID Datablock with mapping of EID and its corresponding PID. FFOLLOT Follower force matrix of current loadcase, to be used for unloading process of the next loadcase. OFCON3DI OFCON3D appended from each output time step (for NLTRAN). OEFNL1H Table of nonlinear element forces for CWELD/CFAST in SORT1 format. CSDOFA2N [6*csnmrk,1] vector of 0’s/1’s indicating if an Adams DOF is in Nastran fe-set.
Used for Adams-Nastran coupled simulation. CSA2FE [fesize,1] vector of 0 (a-set) and 1 (o-set). Used for Adams-Nastran coupled simulation. OFCRFM Cohesive contact item codes. OFGCON Global contact item codes. OFCRFMI Cohesive contact item codes (for NLTRAN only when NLPACK <> 1). OFGCONI Global contact item codes (for NLTRAN only when NLPACK <> 1).

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF initialization module2314 Main Index Parameters:N3DFRC Save the friction force of 3D contact at the final iteration. N3DCTC Save the contact force of 3D contact at the final iteration. OBCNURB Analytical spline of DEFORM BCBODYs. OBCNURBI Analytical spline of DEFORM BCBODYs (for NLTRAN only when NLPACK <> 1). FINERT1 Matrix of inertia force. FDAMPI1 Matrix of damping force. FENL1I FENL1 for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. N3DFRCI N3DFRC for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. N3DCTCI N3DCTC for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. FINERTI FINERT1 for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. FDAMPII FDAMPI1 for NLPACK > 1 in NLTRAN. OCNTCHK Contact status check of GRIDs. OCNTCHKI OCNTCHK for NLTRAN only NLPACK <> 1. OFPMDPOS OFP data position for modules. KRATIO Input/output-complex-default=(1.,0.). Stiffness ratio used for time step adjustment. CONV Input/output-integer-default=0. Nonlinear analysis convergence flag. On input: 0 Initialization On output: -1 Convergence has not been achieved. 1 Convergence has been achieved. STIMEX Input/output-real-default=0.0. On initial input, starting time step and on output, accumulated time used for restarts. NEWP Output-integer-default=0. New SUBCASE or STEP case FLAG. -1 Current case has not been completed. 1 Current case has been completed. NEWK Input/output-integer-default=0. Stiffness update flag. -1 Do not update stiffness.

0 Update stiffness and represents the number of consecutive time steps which have shown divergence. If this number reaches 5, the solution process is terminated.

2315 NMINIT NLPERF initialization module Main Index OLDDT Input/output-real-default=0.0. Time step increment used in the previous iteration or
time step to be used after the matrix update or subcase switch. NSTEP Input/output-integer-default=0. Current time step position for the current STEP case, set to 0 at the beginning of the STEP case. LGDISP0 Input/output-integer-default=0. Large displacement and follower force flag. -1 No large displacement and follower force effects will be considered. 1 Large displacement and follower force effects will be considered. 2 Only large displacement effects will be considered. Displacement effects will be considered. CONSEC Input/output-integer-default=0. A composite number equal to 10*value of NSTEP the last time MAXBIS was reached) + (the number of consecutive time steps which have reached MAXBIS. If CONSEC=10, the solution process is terminated. ITERID Input/output-integer-default=0. Nonlinear analysis iteration count. ITIME Input-real-default=0.0. Initial time step at the beginning of a current STEP case. KTIME Input/output-integer-default=0. CPU time remaining. If KTIME is positive then KTIME is the time remaining at the start of the stiffness update. If negative, no stiffness update was done since the last exit from NLITER. KTIME still holds the negative of the stiffness update time from the last stiffness update. LASTUPD Input/output-integer-default=0. The time step number of the last stiffness update at:

previous converged solution. < an intermediate iteration of the current time step. =1 the last iteration. NOGONL Output-integer-default=0. Nonlinear “no-go” flag. Set to +1 to continue or -1 to terminate. NBIS Input/output-integer-default=0. Current bisection counter. MAXLP Input-integer-default=0. Maximum limit allowed for element relaxation iteration and the material subincrement processes. TSTATNEW Input-integer-default=-1. Static analysis flag. -1 ANALYSIS=NLTRAN. 1 ANALYSIS<>NLTRAN; STATIC solutions (Set to 1 to ignore inertia and damping forces, old one.) LANGLES Input-integer-default=1. Large rotation calculation method. 1 Gimbal angle 2 Left rotation vector Right rotation vector. NDAMP Input-real-default=0. Numerical damping.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF initialization module2316 Main Index TABS Input-real-default=0.0. Absolute temperature conversion. For example, set to 273.16 when specifying temperatures in Celsius or 459.69 in Fahrenheit. SIGMA Input-real-default=0.0. The Stefan-Boltzmann constant. Used to compute radiant heat flux. NORADMAT Input-integer-default=0. Radiation flag -2 No radiation -1 Initial radiation 1 Single band radiation with constant emissivity 2 Radiation with temperature dependent emissivity 3 Multiple band radiation with constant emissivity ADPCONX Input-real-default=1.0. Contact penalty value. Scale factor for adjusting penalty values on restart. Update penalty values if positive. PBCONT Input-integer-default=0. Slideline contact flag. NBCONT Input/output-integer-default=0. Number of bisections due to slideline contact. M3DMPC Input-integer. 3D contact with MPC flag. < 0 No 3D contact or 3D contact with Lagrange multipliers ≥ 0 3D contact with MPC equations MNEWK Input/output-integer-default=1. Matrix update flag for 3D contact. ≤ 0 Matrix update not required by 3D contact

0 Matrix update required by 3D contact OFLAG Input/output-integer-default=0. Output control flag. On input: < 0 Print the title lines for iteration message and/or print the output only information before exiting ≥ 0 Do not print the title lines for iteration message On output: = 0 No output exit ≥ 1 Output on exit TANALY Input-character-default=’ ‘. Type of nonlinear analysis. ‘NLTR’ Nonlinear transient ‘NLST’ Nonlinear statics ‘LNST’ Linear statics ‘STATICS’ SOL 101 Linear statics FKSYMFAC Input-real-default=1.0. Follower stiffness symmetry actor tolerance. Usually input by user parameter.

2317 NMINIT NLPERF initialization module Main Index RSTFLG Input-integer-default=-1. Restart flag. ≤ 0 Cold start run = 1 Restart run NLPACK Input-integer-default=100. Nonlinear transient analysis append flag. ≤ 0 Append all output time steps together in each STEP case before processing the output procedure

0 Append the value of NLPACK output time steps together in each STEP case before output procedure. GPFORCE Input-integer-no default. The number of columns in FENL. If GPFORCE less than or equal to zero then no GPFORCE or ESE command is present. GNLSTN Input-integer-no default. Geometric nonlinear strain flag. Usually input by user parameter. 0 Small strain 1 Green strain MSCHGZ Input-integer-default=-1 . Boundary condition change flag. ≤ 0 No change 0 Changed K6ROT Input-real. Scaling factor of the penalty stiffness to be added to the normal rotation for QUAD4 and TRIA3. WTMASS Input-real-default=1.0. Scale factor on structural mass matrix. TSTATIC Input-integer-default=-1. Static analysis flag. Coming from the PARAM TSTATIC entry. In SOL 129, this flag will make code work like a nonlinear static analysis. In SOL 400, this flag is used when ANALYSIS=NLTRAN and it still works like a nonlinear transient analysis but ignore all mass and damping matrices. -1 Normal dynamic solution 1 Normal dynamic solution, ignoring inertia and damping STIMEF Output-real-default=0.0. Time to update follower stiffness. STEPCUR Input-integer-no default. Current STEP case number in current SUBCASE. This value is initialized at the beginning of each SUBCASE. STEPNXT
TANALOLDInput-character-default=’ ‘. Analysis type of previous step. ITOPTX Input-Integer- Default=1. Element-based solver options flag. -2 Determine whether element-based solver is selected for use -1 Determine whether any element-based solver restrictions have been violated

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF initialization module2318 Main Index

0 A combination of bit values used to select solver options as follows: CASPIV Input- real-default=1.0e-10. Pivot threshold for CASI PCG factorization. LMTOPTX Input- integer-default=0. Lagrange to MPC transform and equation solver options. 1 T ransform LMT to MPC 2 Use element-based iterative solver 4 Use matrix-based iterative solver AUTOMSC1 Input- real-default=10.0. Scaling value for Auto-Mset. AUTOMSC2 . Input- real-default=0.01. LMT T ransformation HGGTOUT Input-Integer-Default=0. Flag for immediate output of HGGT matrix without doing any nonlinear operation 0 Do regular nonlinear solution operations 1 Generate HGGT matrix and exit immediately NDAMPM Input-real-default=0.0. Numerical parameter for GEN-ALPHA. LASTCNMU Input/output-real-default=0.0. Last converged value of MU. LSTEP Input/output-integer-default=0. Load step. RSTEP Input/output-integer-default=0. The count of controlled increments. ARCLG Input/output-real-default=0. The arc length at the last converged step. ARCSGN Input/output-integer-default=0.0. The sign of P DOT DELP at the beginning of the subcase. This is used in RESTARTS in the post-buckling region.Bit Value Option 0 0 Run solver with all defaults 1 1 Use CASI solver 2 2 Use VKI solver 3 4 Reserved 4 8 Reserved 5 16 Reserved 6 32 Reserved 7 64 Use open core for solver memory 8 128 Generate intermediate diagnostics 9 256 Use alternate PCG method 10 512 CASI - reduce i/o 11 1024 CASI - adapt PCG 12 2048 CASI - do not use implicit elements

2319 NMINIT NLPERF initialization module Main Index G,W3,W4 Input/output-real-default=0. Scale factors for use in preparing damping matrix (CASI). NLIC Input/output-real-default=0. T rue if NLIC presents. NLICFLG Input/output-real-default=0. T rue if NLIC presents first time. STIMEHSC Input/output-integer-default=0.0. Offset to the initial time(itime) for heat-structure chaining analysis. HGENPLAS Input-real-default=0.0. Plastic work to heat conversion factor. MAXRATIO Input/output-real-default=0. Maximum ratio of KAA diag to factor diag B input matrix considered nearly singular PARTI Input/output-integer-default=0. For model partition. MPCPCH Input-integer-default=0. Unused. ASSEMK Input-integer-default=0. Flag used in conjunction with CASI solver that determines whether the older technique of having assembled global stiffness matrix and partitions present or the new technique of having only element matrices available is used during LMT operations. If ASSEMK<0, assembled matrices are available. NLOOPH Input-integer-default=0. Loop number of selected temperature results in thermal database. ICPLD Input-integer-default=1. Multi-physics pass number. 1 Heat 2 Mechanical NUMCPLD Input-integer-default=1. Number of multi-physics passes in step. NEWCPLD Input-integer-default=0. Flag to indicate change in multi-physics pass. 0 No change 1 Change in physics NBISCPLD Input-integer-default=0. Number of bisections for multi-physics analysis. NCPLOOP Input-integer-default=1. Loop number of coupled analysis. HGENFRIC Input-real-default=0.0. Frictional work to heat conversion factor. DTCPLD Input-real-default=0.0. Unused. TOTALTIM Input-real-default=1.0. Total time of the load step. OPENFSI Input-integer-default=0. Direction of pressures. LGDISP Input-integer-default=0. Large displacement flag input by user. EXTSYS Input/output-integer-default=0. Communication flag between Adams and NLSOLV. 0 Regular Nastran run

0 NLFE-MBS external system 1 Iteration mode 2 Bisection is requested, the time increment is cut in half

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF initialization module2320 Main Index 9 Activate the convergence processing NSTPCPLD Output-integer-default=0. Flag for zeroth inc. for statics in multi-physics -1 Zeroth increment ≥ 1 Regular increments ITMPCPLD Input-integer-default=0. Flag for initial temperature for the 0th increment for statics. 2 Zero initial temperature 3 Specified initial temperature NUMCPLDY Input-integer-default=1. Number of multi-physics passes in subcase. STIMERT Output-real-default=0.0. Time at end of each loadcase. CSFLG Input-integer-default=0. Coupled solution control flag. CSDBG Input-integer-default=0. Coupled solution debug flag. CSNMRK Input-integer-default=0. Number of Adams-Nastran shared markers. LCFACT Output-real-default=0.0. Factor to reduce Adams time step. CSERROR Output-integer-default=0. Error info message number. CSALPHAH Input-real-default=0.0. HHT Alpha parameter from Adams. CSBETAH Input-real-default=0.0. HHT Beta parameter from Adams. CSGAMMAH Input-real-default=0.0. HHT Gamma parameter from Adams. CSCONCD Output-integer-default=-1. Contact code flag. IMPFID Input-integer-default=0. Imperfection ID. ANALYCHN Input-character-default=’ ‘. Analysis type. COSMID Input-integer-default=0. ID of COSMSEL in case control. INICNT Input-integer-default=0. Flag of the first BCONTACT in the current subcase. 0 Not the first BCONTACT 1 It is the first BCONTACT in the current subcase ISWITCH Input/output-integer-default=0. Code flow control flag.

2321 NMOUTPT NLPERF output module Main Index NLPERF control module for output and data recovery. Format: Input Data Block:NMOUTPT NLPERF output module NMOUTPT CASEX , CSTMS, MPTS, DITS, EQEXINS, ETT , OTMH , OLBH , BGPDTS , UPVNLH , UPVNLR , XYCDBS , GEOM2S , ESTLNS , ESTNLH , ELDATAH , EST , GPSNTS , DEQATN , DEQIND , DITID , PCOMPTS, EDT , ESTMGX , GRPSTM , MTSTM , MTSTM1 , MTSTM2 , MTSTM3 , MTSTM4 , MMTX , MMTXR , MMTX1 , NLVECM , VCCTM , GCOMM , N2M , OINT , OFVCCT , , HRMSP , CPLDIN1, CPLDTEMP, NLRSMP , OEFNL1H , S2SCGGN , S2SCGGT, GMS , USETD , KPPT , PG , , N3DFRC , N3DCTC , EPTS , MODEMAP , PCDB , XYCDB , USETNC , GMNC , ESTNC , CONTACT/ OESNL1S , OEFNL1 , OESNL2S , OESNL3S , OESNL1X , OESNL1B , OCOMP , OCOMPM , ONLOUTS , ONLOUTV , ONLOUTT , OESXX , OEFNL2 , OTEMPP , OQS2SGN1, OQS2SGT1 , QMGCN1 , QMGNCN1 , QMGCF1 , OEFTBD1 , OQS2SGN , OQS2SGT, PPNLH , QSPH , QMPH , UPVNLHM , OTMHM , ESTNLHM , OFCON3DX, OFCON3D , OFCRFM , OFGCON , OCNTCHKX, OCNTCHK , OBCNURBX, OBCNURBS , OFVCCT , OFPMDPOS / TANALY / MARCELM/ LGDISP0 / NLHEAT / TSTATNEW/ LGSET /S,N,NOSORT2/ PH2OUTX / NUMCPLDY/ APP / ICNTSET /NOGLUED / GPTYP / NOCOMPS /SIGMA / TABS /LANGLES /NEWP /IMPFID /S,N,LOTMH/ S,N,LESTNLHM/NSTEP $ CASEXX Subset of CASECC for current STEP case. CSTMS Coordinate System T ransformation Matrices. MPTS Material Property Table DITS Direct Input table EQEXINS Equivalence table between external and internal grid/scalar identification numbers for the superelement specified by SEID ETT Element T emperature T able OTMH T ransient response time output list appended from each subcase OLBH List of time for uncoupled analysis BGPDTS Basic Grid Point Definition Table UPVNLH Solution matrix from nonlinear analysis (p-set).

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF output module2322 Main Index UPVNLR UPVNLH appended from each output time step (for NLTRAN only). XYCDBS XY Plotter Control Table GEOM2S T able of bulk data entries related to element connectivity and scalar points ESTLNS Nonlinear elements summary table. ESTNLH Nonlinear element summary table at converged step. EST Element summary table GPSNTS Grid point shell normal table DEQATN T able of DEQATN for CBUSH1 shock absorber DEQIND Index table to DEQATN for CBUSH1 shock absorber DITID T able of ID numbers in DIT PCOMPTS Smeared Composite element list EDT T able used to read RDITER for iterative solver ESTMGX Advanced nonlinear element connectivity and type data. GRPSTM Advanced nonlinear element group information. MTSTM Advanced nonlinear ints array, including some materials data. MTSTM1 Advanced nonlinear materials data. MTSTM2 Advanced nonlinear materials pointers. MTSTM3 Advanced nonlinear materials flags. MTSTM4 Advanced nonlinear materials dimensioning data. MMTX Advanced nonlinear element stresses and strains updated state. MMTXR Advanced nonlinear element stresses and strains reference state, matching MMTX. MMTX1 Advanced nonlinear element iterative data. NLVECM Advanced nonlinear vectors. VCCTM Advanced nonlinear VCCT data. GCOMM Advanced nonlinear common blocks. N2M Advanced elements in model. OINT MDMIOUT and NLOUT bulk data entry information. HRMSP Grid point table for Herrmann and/or mDOF heat shell elements. CPLDIN1 Multi-physics input datablock (UPVNLH from other physics). CPLDTEMP Multi-physics Input datablock. NLRSMP R.S. map. OEFNL1H T able of nonlinear element forces for CWELD/CFAST in SORT1 format. S2SCGGN Normal constraint matrix in G-size. S2SCGGT T angential constraint matrix in G-size.

item.title: User's Manual P118
item.description:
2323 NMOUTPT NLPERF output module Main Index GMS Multipoint constraint transformation matrix (m-set by s-set). USETD Displacement set definition table (p-set). KPPT Tangential Stiffness (p-set). PG Static load matrix (g-set). N3DFRC Save the friction force of 3D contact at the final iteration. N3DCTC Save the contact force of 3D contact at the final iteration. EPTS Element property table. MODEMAP Modules map. PCDB Plot control data block for the structure plotter XYCDB XY plotter control table. USETNC U-set for contact. GMNC GM for contact. ESTNC Nonlinear element summary table for matrix update. CONTACT Contact regions specification table.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF output module2324 Main Index Output Data Block: OESNL1S Stress data for nonlinear elements OEFNL1 Force data for nonlinear elements OESNL2S Strain data in linear format OESNL3S Nonlinear element strain output in linear format OESNL1X Nonlinear element stress output in nonlinear format OESNL1B Data for slide contact OCOMP Stress and strain for advanced nonlinear composite elements OCOMPM Min/Max Summary Table for advanced nonlinear composite elements ONLOUTS Scalar type of NLOUT output for advanced nonlinear elements ONLOUTV Vector type of NLOUT output for advanced nonlinear elements ONLOUTT T ensor type of NLOUT output for advanced nonlinear elements OESXX Stress data in linear format OEFNL2 Element forces OTEMPP T able for grid temperature of heat shell elements OQS2SGN1 T able of S2S glued contact normal forces/moments OQS2SGT1 T able of S2S glued contact tangential forces/moments QMGCN1 Contact Force of S2S contact used for GPFORCE output QMGNCN1 Contact Force of permanent glued contact in N2S used for GPFORCE output QMGCF1 Friction Force of 3D Contact used for GPFORCE output OEFTBD1 OFP table of TBD matrix OQS2SGN T able of S2S glued contact normal forces/moments OQS2SGT T able of S2S glued contact tangential forces/moments PPNLH Load matrix for nonlinear analysis. QSPH SPC force matrix for nonlinear analysis. QMPH MPC matrix for nonlinear analysis. UPVNLHM Displacements for nonlinear analysis. OTMHM Load timetable for pure advanced nonlinear element models. ESTNLHM ESTNLH data for pure advanced nonlinear element models. OFCON3DX Contact results at start of analysis. OFCON3D Contact results. OFCRFM Cohesive contact output. OFGCON Global contact item codes. OCNTCHKX Contact status check for GRIDs.

2325 NMOUTPT NLPERF output module Main Index Parameters:OCNTCHK OCNTCHK for NLTRAN only NLPACK <> 1. OBCNURBX Analytical spline of DEFORM BCBODYs. OBCNURBS Analytical spline of DEFORM BCBODYs (for NLTRAN only when NLPACK <> 1). OFVCCT OFP for VCCT. OFPMDPOS Module position datablock for OFP . TANALY Input-characters-default = ’ ‘, T ype of nonlinear analysis, ‘NLTR’ Nonlinear transient ‘NLST’ Nonlinear statics ‘LNST’ Linear statics ‘STATICS’ SOL 101 Linear statics MARCELM Input-logical-default=FALSE. Flag for the presence of advanced nonlinear elements in the analysis LGDISP0 Input/output-integer-default=0. Large displacement and follower force flag -1 No large displacement and follower force effects will be considered 1 Large displacement and follower force effects will be considered 2 Only large displacement effects will be considered NLHEAT Input-logical-default =FALSE, Heat transfer analysis flag TSTATNEW Input-integer-default=-1,Static analysis flag -1 ANALYSIS=NLTRAN 1 ANALYSIS<>NLTRAN; STATIC solutions LGSET Input-characters. DOF set name. NOSORT2 Input/output-integer-default=0, 1 for sort2 PH2OUTX Input-integer-default=0. Flag for intermediate output NUMCPLDY Input-integer-default=1. Number of multi-physics passes in subcase APP Input-character-no default. Analysis type. Allowable types are: ‘STATICS’ Linear Statics ‘REIG’ Normal Modes ‘FREQRESP’ Frequency Response ‘TRANRESP’ T ransient Response ‘NLST’ Nonlinear Static ICNTSET Input-integer-default=0, set of BOUTPUT in CASECC NOGLUED Input-integer-default=0, -1 for glued contact

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide NLPERF output module2326 Main Index GPTYP Input-integer-default=0, Number of words in Record GLUDAT in ACTNOD NOCOMPS Input-integer-default=1, Value of PARAM,NOCOMPS SIGMA Input-real-default=0.0, value of PARAM,SIGMA TABS Input-real-default=0.0, value of PARAM,TABS LANGLES Input-integer-default=1, value of PARAM,LANGLE NEWP Input-integer-default=0. New SUBCASE or STEP case FLAG -1 Current case has not been completed 1 Current case has been completed IMPFID Input-integer-default=0, Imperfection ID LOTMH Output-logical-default=FALSE. TRUE if OTMH datablock is created. LESTNLHM Output-logical-default=FALSE. TRUE if ESTNLH datablock is created NSTEP Input-integer-default=0. Current time step position for the current STEP case

2327 NMSTPINF Writes information to NLPERF solution monitoring iteration file Main Index Reads current step from case control and writes information to NLPERF solution monitoring iteration file. Format: Input Data Block: Output Data Block: none Parameters:NMSTPINF Writes information to NLPERF solution monitoring iteration file NMSTPINF CASEX//S,N,STEPCUR $ CASEX Subset of CASECC for current STEP case. STEPCUR Input-integer-no default. Current STEP case number in current SUBCASE. This value is initialized at the beginning of each SUBCASE.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide Normalize a matrix2328 Main Index To normalize a matrix, each column by its largest element or compute the square root of the sum of the squares for each row of a matrix (SRSS). Format: Input Data Block: Output Data Block: Parameters: Remarks: 1.If IOPT=1 then ANORM is the same as A except each column has been normalized by its maximum absolute value. 2.If IOPT=2 then ANORM is a column vector where the i-th row is the sum of the magnitudes of the terms in the i-th row of A. Examples: 1.Normalize PHIG so that the maximum deflection is 1.0 (or -1.0): NORM PHIG/PHIG1 $NORM Normalize a matrix NORM A/ANORM/S,N,NCOL/S,N,NROW/S,N,XNORM/IOPT/ S,N,XNORMD/PRTSWM $ A Any matrix (real or complex). ANORM Normalized matrix. NCOL Number of columns in A. NROW Integer-output-default=0. Number of rows in A. XNORM Real-output-default=0.0. Maximum absolute normalizing value over all columns. IOPT Integer-input-default=1. Normalization option. 1Normalize by largest element. 2Compute SRSS. XNORMD Real double precision-output-default=0.D0. Same as XNORM except in double precision. PRTSWM Logical-input-default=TRUE. If PRTSUM=FALSE, System Warning Message 6991 is suppressed. This message is printed when the maximum term exceeds the single precision limit for the machine type. When it is TRUE the message is printed.

2329 NORM Normalize a matrix Main Index 2.Compute complex eigenvectors that have been normalized such that the product produces a square matrix with off-diagonal terms of computational zero, and complex diagonal terms whose magnitude is unity. TRNSP CPHG/CPHGT $ NORM CPHGT/CX2////2 $
MATMOD CX2,,,,,/INORM22,/28 $ DIAGONALIZE DIAGONAL INORM22/NORM22/‘WHOLE’/-1.0 $ INVERT MPYAD CPHG,NORM22,/CPHGNORM $ NORMALIZE MPYAD CPHGNORM,CPHGNORM,/N22/1 $ SHOULD BE IDENTITY IN MAGNITUDE DIAGONAL N22/N22MAG/‘WHOLE’/1.0 $ FIND MAGNITUDESCPHGTCPHG

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide Modifies element properties2330 Main Index Modifies element properties table from the NSML and NSML1 records. Format: Input Data Blocks: Output Data Blocks: Parameters:NSMEPT Modifies element properties NSMEPT ECT,EPT,BGPDT,TOMTAB/NEWEPT/S,N,NEWEPT $ ECT Element connectivity table. EPT T able of Bulk Data entry images related to element properties. BGPDT Basic grid point definition table. TOMTAB T able of TOMVAR attributes NEWEPT EPT updated from the NSML and NSML1 records. NEWEPT Output-integer-default=0. NEWEPT creation flag. 0 No. -1 Yes.

2331 OCMP2OES Convert stresses and strains in OCOMP datablock to OES format and merge with original OES Main Index Convert stresses and strains in OCOMP datablock to OES format and merge with original OES. Format: Input Data Blocks: Output Data Blocks: Parameters:OCMP2OES Convert stresses and strains in OCOMP datablock to OES format and merge with original OES OCMP2OES PCOMPT,OCOMP,OES1C,OSTR1C/ OOCOMP,OOES,OOESTR/STRESS/STRAIN $ PCOMPT PCOMPT datablock, check if there are PCOMPG entries. OCOMP OCOMPT datablock. OES1C OES datablock contains stresses of Nastran composite elements. OSTR1C OES datablock contains strains of Nastran composite elements. OOCOMP OCOMPT datablock to hold all records not converted to OES format. OOES OES datablock contains stresses of composite elements. OOESTR OES datablock contains strains of composite elements. Integer stress if > 0, there is stress output request Integer strain if > 0, there is strain output request

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide Module to create the CASEODS table for usage in ODS calculations, words from ODS request are placed into standard output request words.2332 Main Index Module to create the CASEODS table for usage in ODS calculations, words from ODS request are placed into standard output request words. Format: Input Data Blocks: Output Data Blocks: Parameters:ODSCASE Module to create the CASEODS table for usage in ODS calculations, words from ODS request are placed into standard output request words. ODSCASE CASECC/ CASEODS / S,N, NOODS / S,N,PEAKODS $ CASECC Case Control table. CASEODS Processed CASE Control with update from ODS entry. NOODS Output-Logical-Default=FALSE. FALSE No ODS output requested TRUE Composite Stress/Strain output table PEAKODS Output-integer-default=0 0 No ODS = peak requested 1 At least one ODS = peak requested

2333 OESCSRT2 Converts SORT1 format of composite stresses and strains to SORT2 format Main Index Converts SORT1 format of composite stresses and strains to SORT2 format. Format: Input Data Blocks: Output Data Blocks: OESCSRT2 Converts SORT1 format of composite stresses and strains to SORT2 format OESCSRT2 OES1C,OSTR1C/OOES1C2,OOSTR1C2 $ OES1C OES datablock for composite stresses. OSTR1C OES datablock for composite strains. OOES1C2 SORT2 format of composite stresses. OOSTR1C2 SORT2 format of composite strains.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide Output file processor2334 Main Index To output (print or punch) data blocks prepared by other modules in user-oriented, self-explanatory formats. Format: Input Data Blocks: Output Data Blocks: None. Parameters:OFP Output file processor OFP OFP1,OFP2,OFP3,OFP4,OFP5,OFP6, CSTM,UNUSED8,UNUSED9,UNUSED10, DEQATN,DEQIND,DIT,UNUSED 14// UNUSED1/ODCODE/ UNUSED3/ OCID $ OFPi Output table suitable for processing by the OFP module. See Remark 2. CSTM T able of coordinate system transformation matrices. UNUSED8 Unused and may be left blank. UNUSED9 Unused and may be left blank. UNUSED10 Unused and may be left blank. BGPDTVU Basic grid point definition table for a superelement and related to geometry with view- grids added. ERROR1 Error-estimate table updated for current superelement or adaptivity loop. DEQATN T able of DEQATN Bulk Data entry images. DEQIND Index table to DEQATN data block. DIT T able of TABLEDi Bulk Data entry images. UNUSED 14 Unused and may be left unspecified. UNUSED 1 Input/output-integer-default=0. Unused and may be left unspecified. ODCODE Input-integer-default=-1. Output device code override. See Remark 4. ODCODE overrides the code stored in the DBi’s according to the following table: ODCODE Output Directed to: 1 Print 2 Plot 3 Print and Plot 4 Punch 5 Print and Punch

2335 OFP Output file processor Main Index Remarks: 1.Any or all data blocks may be purged. 2.DMAP modules READ (LAMA, OEIGS, LAMX, CLAMX), CEAD (CLAMA and OCEIGS), and LAMX (LAMB) are matrix operation modules that prepare OFP formatted data blocks. Modules SDR2, SDR3, VDR, ADR, CURV, DDRMM, DRMH3, ELFDR, GPFDR, GPWG, LAMX, MDATA, SDRCOMP, SDRX, and SDRHT also prepare OFP formatted data blocks. 3.Parameter ODCODE is not honored by data blocks LAMA, OEIGS, LAMX, CLAMA, and OGPWG, which are created by READ, CEAD, LAMX, and GPWG . 4.CSTM, DEQATN, DEQIND, and DIT are required if the CORD3G Bulk Data entry is present and only for element data recovery; i.e., displacement, stress, strain, etc. Example: Print the OUG1 table from the SDR2 module: OFP OUG1/ $6 Plot and Punch 7 Print, Plot, and Punch UNUSED3 Input-integer-default=0 . Unused and may be left blank. OCID Input-integer-default=0. Print flag for coordinate system identification number in grid point output. The following bits in OCID are set to 1 based on user output requests. 1Displacements. 2Applied loads. 3Apcforces and mpcforces. 7Eigenvectors. 10 Velocities. 11 Accelerations.

MSC Nastran DMAP Programmer’s Guide Massage OFP tables2336 Main Index Massage OFP data blocks for use by DRA / SimX and reformat OEFIT/OESRT tables so they are index-able by OFPINDX module. Format: Input Data Block: Output Data Blocks: Parameter:OFPEXTRA Massage OFP tables OFPEXTRA OFP/OFP1,OFP2/S,N,IRET $ OFP T able suitable for input to OFP module OFP1 Modified OFP OFP2 Auxiliary OFP IRET Output-integer-default=0. Return flag.

2337 OFPINDX Creates an index into an OFP table Main Index Creates an index into an OFP table keyed on subcase, load case and element ID. Format: Input Data Block: None. Output Data Block: Parameters: None. Remarks: 1.OFPDB must be declared as an append file on the FILE statement. 2.The following usage is recommended.
